findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer
findings.description: The transfer function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper validation.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: allow a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Mint Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The mint function has a vulnerability marked with 🛑 symbol.

findings.title: Unprotected burn() Function
findings.description: The burn() function is not properly protected and can lead to unintended token burns.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are present in the contract, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any access modifiers or reentrancy protection, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor of ERC20Detailed does not initialize its state variables.
